actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to compensate the social security trust funds for payroll tax receipts that are lost when the unemployment rate is above 6 percent.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide additional funds to the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund when the unemployment rate exceeds six percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to compensate the social security trust funds for payroll tax receipts that are lost when the unemployment rate is above 6 percent.
